name: Little Miss Laser: Super Fun!
description:
Little Miss Laser: Super Fun! is about a little girl who is angry at her homework so she starts screaming at it until it explodes
And then she screams at people until they explode
And then she screams at kittens until they explode
And then she screams at cars until they explode
And then she screams at houses until they explode
And then she screams at tanks until they explode
And then she screams at buildings until they explode
And then she screams at fighter jets until they explode
And then she screams at satellites until they explode
And then she screams at the moon until it explodes
And then she screams at the earth until it explodes

Made by Kevin "Gaeel" Bradshaw, Victor "Zoryall" Depardieu, and Elodie "Mayatako" Leroy, at Zoo Machines 2016

(Only for Google Cardboard)
